rules.description: Home row mods - ctrl, opt, shift, command
Home row mods - ctrl, opt, shift, command
caps_lock as Escape when tapped, Hyper (⌃⌥⌘⇧) when held
esc when tapped, ctrl when held
Home row mods - ctrl, opt, shift, command
Change caps_lock to left_control if pressed with other keys, change caps_lock to escape if pressed alone.
